Plintissa looked at Ramhorn. He was ignoring her and she didn't know why.

"Any way I could help? Got to show how sorry I am!" Plintissa said to
Ramhorn...
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 09, 2000 6:28 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Beachcomber/Smokescreen/Ramhorn/Breakdown/Hiss:
>
> Beachcomber arrived on the scene of the Ark.  "What an enormous ship." he
> said, referring to the Ark.  Seeing Breakdown and Hiss he sighed.
> -Predacons,- he thought, noticing their shape, size, and colors, -I guess
the
> Ark has been conqured-.  Raising his laser rifle, which came from
subspace,
> he took aim at Breakdown.
>
> --------
>
> Smokescreen came from the foilage, his electro-discharge rifle ready.
> Looking around he saw a few craters.  "Rather deserted." Smokescreen
> activating his com to the giant ship.  <This is the Maximal unit,
> Smokescreen, respond please>
>
> -------
>
> Ramhorn jumped a little, hearing Smokescreen message suddenly.  <This is
> Ramhorn, welcome, Smokescreen.  I guess you could say I'm temporarily in
> command, defense wise at least.  Go to the door in front of you and enter.
I
> will be there to great you shortly after>
>
> -------
>
> <Alright...> Smokescreen said slowly over his com, ending the comlink.
> Walking to the door in front of him, the massive orange-yellow door slid
> open, Smokescreen entering the doors shutting and sealing behind him.
>
> --------
>
> Beachcomber was about to pull the trigger, but decided not too.  There
could
> be mass reinforcements from the Ark if he attacked.  Jumping from the
> foilage, he slammed he rifle across Hiss' face, sending the Predacon merc.
to
> the ground, mech-fluid trickling down his face.
>
> Breakdown laughed, uppercutting, sending Beachcomber slamming to his back.
> "Worthless Maximal." Breakdown said with a smile, jumping downwards at
> Beachcomber.  Beachcomber raised his feet, Breakdown landing on them,
> Beachcomber yelling out in pain as the Alliance member hung in the air
> momentarily, but with all his strength the Maximal sent Breakdown flying
into
> a tree behind him.
>
